author: ekoneil
msg: Fixup the JSR 173 API download that is fetched from http://workshop.bea.com/xmlbeans.  This is needed to get a JSR 173 package that is licensed correctly such that it can be shipped as part of an Apache project.

author: mc
msg: Add the task state string to the web interface.  This
lets you track current progress through a map or reduce

author: gdaniels
msg: We need the newer version of stax-1.1.1-dev.jar for this to work without duplicated namespaces.  Backing this change out for the moment until we have access to a good version of that in a solid repository.

author: ekoneil
msg: Complete rewrite of the NetUI project model documentation.  This now includes more detail about:
- how to configure the <build-pageflows> Ant macro to build such projects
- add a "Required" column to the JAR list
- add a list of required / optional XML resources including those for validation
- add information about what JARs to commit to source control (if using)
- add information about what is produced when building a Page Flow
- removing information about deploying an application to Tomcat
- remove the Ant build file that was at the end of the doc

author: jukka
msg: JCR-212: Decorate all the login methods using the canonical login(Credentials, String) method.
